Examples

> |

In the following example the value of the orient attribute is updated using setOrientToAngle() using an {{domxref("SVGAngle")}} created using {{domxref("SVGSVGElement.createSVGAngle()")}}.

title: SVGMarkerElement: setOrientToAngle() method
summary: The setOrientToAngle() method of the SVGMarkerElement interface sets the value of the orient attribute to the value in the SVGAngle passed in.
pageTitle: SVGMarkerElement: setOrientToAngle() method - Web APIs | MDN
